Contributor: David Allen & Sons, printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: "Poster No. 73" appears on the bottom left of poster. "W.2174. 5M-5/15" appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Illustration shows two servicemen on the battlefield. Text says to help and not to just watch.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 73.
